title: Customer Service Representative
description: As a Customer Service Representative, you'll be an integral part of our fast-paced environment, supporting on-site community fundraising initiatives and representing our clients with professionalism and impact. This is an entry-level role where your willingness to learn and commitment to success are key. We provide comprehensive training and ongoing support to ensure you thrive in your role and find fulfillment in your work. Responsibilities: Answer customer questions in person at our events, representing our clients with the utmost professionalism Deliver outstanding service by successfully responding to all questions and queries Attend daily meetings and workshops Stay up to date on new services and programs All other tasks as assigned by the Management Team Requirements: Authorization to work in the United States High School Diploma or Equivalent Full-time availability to work on-site Quick Learner Effective Communication Skills Prior experience in Sales, Fundraising, Hospitality, or Public Relations is an asset We Offer: Paid Training Competitive Compensation Personal and Professional Development Positive and Fun Team Environment Travel Opportunities Ready to embark on a fulfilling career journey with us? Apply now

title: Event Staff
description: Love the idea of helping others? Want to make a career out of something you truly enjoy doing? You are the person we want We are seeking FUN, HIGH ENERGY people with AMAZING personalities to join our Event Team We represent client campaigns and work directly in the community. If you have these qualities, we are willing to train you for the growth and opportunities that we have available Duties: Event Setup and Maintenance Answer questions regarding our Campaign Customer Service Present our Clients Mission to the Public Management Training Qualifications: Must be 18 Must be authorized to work in the United States Must possess Great Communication and People Skills Must possess a Fun, Energetic Personality Must have Reliable Transportation We Offer: Paid Internships and Full-time Opportunities Available Fun Company Culture Growth Opportunities Excellent Earning Potential We are looking for LOCAL candidates who can start IMMEDIATELY

title: Customer Service/Sales Rep
description: Would being part of a cutting edge technology company that passionately cares about customers and delivers best-in-class service appeal to you? Then you’ll love being a member of our Team We are seeking dedicated, enthusiastic Customer Service Sales Representatives with an entrepreneurial drive that are eager to grow in a fun, dynamic work environment. The available position specializes in Customer Service, Customer Support, and Sales. Qualifications: -Great Conversational Skills -Positive Attitude -Willingness To Learn -Team Player Mentality -Desire To Help Others -Unparalleled Work Ethic -Solution Oriented Personality Responsibilities: Communicate and understand customer issues Provide information on new products and services Represent the Client brand with the utmost professionalism and courtesy Build value by offering tailored and thoughtful solutions to fit each consumers needs We Offer: Competitive Compensation and Incentives Paid Training Growth Opportunities Full-time, Permanent Positions Available

title: Fundraising Team
description: Are you driven by Purpose and fueled by Passion to change the World? Do you want to Make a Difference on a Daily Basis? Do you have experience working with Nonprofits or want to gain that experience? The ideal candidate will be a passionate individual with experience working on a variety of campaigns, people skills and an eye for strategic thinking. Our company works with both Local and National Nonprofit Clients to increase brand awareness, build donor relationships and fundraise. We are a positive company focused on personal and professional development. We want people that are willing to shift their mindset to focus on getting results while making the work part of work FUN Duties: Attend events as scheduled Engage with the community and with our clients' consumer base to create brand awareness Answer questions regarding our clients' programs and services Develop and implement new training material Other duties as assigned Qualifications: Must be 18 years Must be local, this position is in person only Ability to work in a fast paced environment and adapt to changing demands Willingness to work independently and within a team Positive attitude Growth minded

description: Love the idea of helping others? Want to make a career out of something you truly enjoy doing? You are the person we want We are seeking FUN, HIGH ENERGY people with AMAZING personalities to join our Event Team We represent client campaigns and work directly in the community. If you have these qualities, we are willing to train you for the growth and opportunities that we have available Duties: Event Setup and Maintenance Answer questions regarding our Campaign Customer Service Present our Clients Mission to the Public Management Training Qualifications: Must be 18 Must be authorized to work in the United States Must possess Great Communication and People Skills Must possess a Fun, Energetic Personality Must have Reliable Transportation We Offer: Paid Internships and Full-time Opportunities Available Fun Company Culture Growth Opportunities Excellent Earning Potential We are looking for LOCAL candidates who can start IMMEDIATELY

title: Fundraising Team
description: Are you driven by Purpose and fueled by Passion to change the World? Do you want to Make a Difference on a Daily Basis? Do you have experience working with Nonprofits or want to gain that experience? The ideal candidate will be a passionate individual with experience working on a variety of campaigns, people skills and an eye for strategic thinking. Our company works with both Local and National Nonprofit Clients to increase brand awareness, build donor relationships and fundraise. We are a positive company focused on personal and professional development. We want people that are willing to shift their mindset to focus on getting results while making the work part of work FUN Duties: Attend events as scheduled Engage with the community and with our clients' consumer base to create brand awareness Answer questions regarding our clients' programs and services Develop and implement new training material Other duties as assigned Qualifications: Must be 18 years Must be local, this position is in person only Ability to work in a fast paced environment and adapt to changing demands Willingness to work independently and within a team Positive attitude Growth minded

title: Customer Service Representative
description: As a Customer Service Representative, you'll be an integral part of our fast-paced environment, supporting on-site community fundraising initiatives and representing our clients with professionalism and impact. This is an entry-level role where your willingness to learn and commitment to success are key. We provide comprehensive training and ongoing support to ensure you thrive in your role and find fulfillment in your work. Responsibilities: Answer customer questions in person at our events, representing our clients with the utmost professionalism Deliver outstanding service by successfully responding to all questions and queries Attend daily meetings and workshops Stay up to date on new services and programs All other tasks as assigned by the Management Team Requirements: Authorization to work in the United States High School Diploma or Equivalent Full-time availability to work on-site Quick Learner Effective Communication Skills Prior experience in Sales, Fundraising, Hospitality, or Public Relations is an asset We Offer: Paid Training Competitive Compensation Personal and Professional Development Positive and Fun Team Environment Travel Opportunities Ready to embark on a fulfilling career journey with us? Apply now

title: Solar Energy Consultant
description: Join the Solar Revolution in Irving, TX Position: Solar Energy Consultant Location: Irving, TX Experience: NO EXPERIENCE NEEDED – WE WILL TRAIN YOU Are you ready to shine in a career that’s truly electrifying? As a Solar Energy Consultant, you’ll help homeowners ditch high electric bills and embrace a greener, more sustainable future. You’ll educate clients on the benefits of solar energy, close sales, and grow with a rapidly expanding team. We’ll even provide warm leads daily to ensure you hit the ground running Responsibilities: Educate Homeowners: Provide clear and engaging explanations of state-backed solar programs, empowering homeowners to make informed decisions about sustainable energy. Simplify Energy Solutions: Break down complex electric bills and solar energy options into straightforward, easy-to-understand solutions. Engage in Training and Team Development: Participate in hands-on field training and weekly team meetings to continuously sharpen your skills and stay updated on industry best practices. Schedule Appointments: Identify and connect with qualified prospects, setting appointments to guide them through their transition to solar energy. We Offer: Competitive Compensation Paid Hands-On Training Advancement Opportunities Growth Potential Supportive Team Atmosphere Requirements: Reliable transportation Strong communication skills, goal-oriented mindset, and motivation to be the best Must be 18 years or older and eligible to work in the U.S. Ready to become a Solar Superstar? Apply today and take the first step toward a brighter career

title: Fundraising Team
description: Are you driven by Purpose and fueled by Passion to change the World? Do you want to Make a Difference on a Daily Basis? Do you have experience working with Nonprofits or want to gain that experience? The ideal candidate will be a passionate individual with experience working on a variety of campaigns, people skills and an eye for strategic thinking. Our company works with both Local and National Nonprofit Clients to increase brand awareness, build donor relationships and fundraise. We are a positive company focused on personal and professional development. We want people that are willing to shift their mindset to focus on getting results while making the work part of work FUN Duties: Attend events as scheduled Engage with the community and with our clients' consumer base to create brand awareness Answer questions regarding our clients' programs and services Develop and implement new training material Other duties as assigned Qualifications: Must be 18 years Must be local, this position is in person only Ability to work in a fast paced environment and adapt to changing demands Willingness to work independently and within a team Positive attitude Growth minded
